name: Hacked In
description:
After hacking 387 individual bank accounts and the missile launch codes, in order to get your pardon, you need to hack and take down a secret robot corporation with help of a governments AI called C.H.R.I.S. (Control Helping Risky Incredible SuperAI) 

Can you defeat The King of All Robots?

Can you beat my highscore of 530?

Download the game for better performance.

Mobile support on the Web build! 

How to play:

Aim with your mouse to move

Left mouse button to shoot

Right mouse button to eject and self destruct

Collide with enemies to hack them and get control of them

The AI C.H.R.I.S. will dash to dodge bullets for you.

On mobile:

Touch anywhere to aim

Hold to shoot

Tap twice at the same time to eject and self destruct

This game was made in 72 hours for the Wowie Jam 4.0.

Theme: Collaborate with AI.

Both soundtracks and art were made by myself.

Headphones recommended!
